reviewText: I like to play cooking games because they inspire to make food on real life too. If something looks good in game then I will try to make it myself and if something is really hard to make in game then.. I won't even bother, haha! I liked this game because there were many recipes I had not even heard of and I ended up trying them really and they were very good. On down side the game needs fast mouse movement in pattern so it can be tiring if you have injury on your arm like I do. Good past time but price is too high for how short it is. Good thing I got it from auction!
voteText: 24 of 29 people (83%) found this review helpful 5 people found this review funny

reviewText: What a truly lovely game absolutly great for killing time and having a good time at that. great things about the game is the sheer amount of cooking to be done i mean ive played 70 mins and im not even half way through im about 2 restrunts in and i was playing quickly and there is 8 restrunts well training institutions i should say its like suger training or egg training produce training etc etc its absolutly great fun now i got it in a steam sale at £5 it will go back to £10.99 soon and i still recommend it at £10 absolutly great game if you have any other questions you can add me and i can ansaw them. lovely game

reviewText:
I hope they make more of these games! its so fun to play,I picked it up during the last sale and I'm so glad I did,heres some more of my thoughts on it:

1.Its worth the price!(even if I had found it when it wasn't on sale I still would of paid full price for it)
2.It reminds me of Cooking Mama but I honestly like this game more!
3.I have over 10 hours in this game at the time of writting this and I'm still not done beating it yet!
4.Easy to learn how to play!
5.3 games in one!
6. Each game can be put into windowed mode!
7.Addictive!

reviewText: This is actually just cooking mama in disguise as a pc game. I'm suprised they haven't gotten any copyright complaints.\nIt even has a bunch of the same recipes and the exact same mini games.\nIt would probably be easier to play on a tablet.

reviewText: -its Great game and it`s up to you to prepare over 50 different recipes!  :D\n-i hope this game make new version
Game is not very good on a pc. Seems like mobile or handheld port that was not fitted for pc use. Too clunky.

If you can't take the heat, then I recommend that you relocate to a place other than the kitchen where perhaps it will be slightly cooler because the kitchen will be quite warm during the cooking process and would likely bother you if you are not accustomed to, or comfortable being in places with a higher temperature than you are familiar with.

reviewText:
A Collection of 3 Offline Web-Browser Games that's really fun and delivers a Master Chef of Recipes & Tasty Dishes!

In Cooking Academy 1, Grab your oven mitts and don your chef`s hat! Cooking Academy is the game that places you in the kitchens of a prestigious culinary school! From eggrolls to pancakes, to creme brulee, it`s up to you to prepare over 50 different recipes! Learn interesting trivia about food while mastering the skills of chopping, kneading, mashing, flipping, frying, and much more! Unlock new recipes and trophies by passing your cooking courses and exams. Are you ready to be a Master Chef?

In Cooking Academy 2: World Cuisine, Welcome to the World Culinary Workshop! Cooking Academy 2 will put you in the kitchens of restaurants from all corners of the globe. From Chinese BBQ Pork Buns, to Mexican Tamales, to Japanese Sushi, make your way through 60 different recipes from eight different countries! Learn interesting trivia about food while mastering all new skills and mini-games including food processors, mixers, raiding the fridge and much more! Complete all all the Recipes & Exams to win the $1,000,000 Prize & Open up your own restaurant!

And In Cooking Academy 3: Recipe for Success, After winning $1,000,000 and starting your own restaurant, you are now writing your very own cookbook! And who better to help your research than your old professor Henri Formage and his friends! Learn interesting trivia about food while mastering all new skills and mini-games including Refrigerate, Seasoning, Find Food, and much more! Cook croissants, tapioca pudding, chicken & waffles, and many more new, exciting recipes! Complete all all the Recipes & Exams to Make your own Cookbook for your restaurant!

This a Fantasic Collection of Cooking Games that will make you feel like a Master Chef.

If you're looking for Cooking Academy: Restaurant Royale, use this link
http://www.bigfishgames.com/games/7983/cooking-academy-restaurant-royale-f2p/
